PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_WasteTerminalTypeGreaseInterceptor
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Chamber, on the line of a drain or discharge pipe, that prevents grease passing into a drainage system (BS6100 330 6205).

PropertyDef.Name: NominalBodyMaterial
PropertyDef.Definition: The material from which the object is constructed.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalBodyLength
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal or quoted length, measured along the x-axis of the local coordinate system of the object, of the body of the object.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalBodyWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal or quoted length, measured along the y-axis of the local coordinate system of the object, of the body of the object.

PropertyDef.Name: BodyDepth
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal or quoted length, measured along the z-axis of the local coordinate system of the object, of the body of the object.

PropertyDef.Name: StrainerMaterial
PropertyDef.Definition: Material from which the strainer is constructed.

PropertyDef.Name: StrainerDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition: Diameter, measured in plan view, of the strainer basket.

PropertyDef.Name: StrainerDepth
PropertyDef.Definition: Depth, measured in elevation view, of the strainer basket.

PropertyDef.Name: CoverLength
PropertyDef.Definition: The length measured along the x-axis in the local coordinate system or the radius (in the case of a circular shape in plan) of the cover of the grease interceptor.

PropertyDef.Name: CoverWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: The length measured along the x-axis in the local coordinate system of the cover of the grease interceptor.

PropertyDef.Name: CoverMaterial
PropertyDef.Definition: Material from which the cover is constructed.
